credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton on linen foundation
Technique: satin, stem and eyelet stitches on plain weave
description: Sampler is divided into squares and rectangles, each with an embroidered motif.  Scenes include: the seal of Mexico, a Pascal Lamb, a lion, a stag, several figures in European-style dress, and numerous floral patterns. A band of whitework extends across the bottom.
name: Sampler
